Package coreClasses

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
coreClasses.Ship
public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a ship
Since:
2/4/2021
Version:
25/5/2021
Author:
Hugo Phibbs

  • Constructor Details

    • Ship

      public Ship​(java.lang.String name, int speed, int shipSize, int maxDefenseCapability) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Constructor for a Ship object
      Parameters:
      name - String for the name of the ship
      speed - int for the speed of the ship as it travels between islands (assume constant), number out of 100
      shipSize - int for the size of the ship, influences crew size and the max cargo space of a ship, number out of 10
      maxDefenseCapability - int for the max defense capability of a ship, number out of 40
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if constructor parameters are invalid

  • Method Details

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage​(int damage)
      Enacts damage onto Ship Object
      Parameters:
      damage - int for damage to be inflicted onto ship

    • repairShip

      public boolean repairShip()
      Repairs a Ship object. Repairs ship if a Player has enough money to pay the cost.
      Returns:
      A boolean value if ship was repaired

    • payWages

      public boolean payWages​(Route route, Player player)
      Pays the wages for the Ship's crew
      Parameters:
      route - Route object that the Ship is sailing on between two islands
      player - Player object for player that is currently playing
      Returns:
      Boolean if wages were paid or not

    • addUpgrade

      public void addUpgrade​(ShipUpgrade upgrade)
      Adds a new upgrade to this Ship. Checking if a ship can add this upgrade is handled by Store
      Parameters:
      upgrade - Upgrade object to be added to ship

    • upgradesToString

      public java.lang.String upgradesToString()
      Method for converting upgrades that a Ship has into String form
      Returns:
      String representation of the upgrades that a Ship has

    • routeWageCost

      public int routeWageCost​(Route route)
      Method that returns the total wage cost for traveling along a route
      Parameters:
      route - Route object that a Ship wishes to travel on
      Returns:
      int for the total wage cost to travel along this route

    • calculateDaysSailing

      public int calculateDaysSailing​(Route route)
      Calculates the number of days sailing on a particular route Rounds up to the ceiling of the route.getDistance() / speed to ensure that all routes have at least 1 days sailing. Otherwise this would break paying wages for routes less than 1 days sailing
      Parameters:
      route - Route object with distance to be calculated with
      Returns:
      int for the days sailing of inputed Route

    • repairCost

      public int repairCost()
      Method that returns the cost to repair ship because of damage
      Returns:
      int for the cost of a ship repair

    • addItem

      public void addItem​(Item item)
      Adds an Item Object to this Ship's cargo hold
      Parameters:
      item - Item object to be added to cargo hold

    • takeItem

      public Item takeItem​(java.lang.String itemName)
      Takes Item from ship and returns it
      Parameters:
      itemName - String name for the name of Item to be removed
      Returns:
      Item object with name matching itemName. Returns null if a match wasnt found

    • upgradesToNestedArray

      public java.lang.String[][] upgradesToNestedArray()
      Creates a String[][] representation of the upgrades that have been bought for a ship Used by GUI for displaying to tables
      Returns:
      String[][] representation of the upgrades that have been bought
